title: Eco-Chic Duplex in Vibrant Stare Miasto with Green Touches
description: Experience contemporary sustainable living in the heart of Poznan’s storied Stare Miasto. This modern duplex unfurls across 158 sqm, artfully balancing brightness and functionality. The generous, open-plan living area is complemented by four serene bedrooms, two thoughtfully designed bathrooms, ample storage spaces, and a tailor-made walk-in closet. Exquisite modern lighting, an intelligent video intercom, and automated gates redefine security and ease; natural accents provide an inspired canvas for urban minds keen on eco-conscious living.
neighborhood_description: Immerse yourself in Stare Miasto’s dynamic harmony—a tech-forward nucleus thriving alongside tranquil parks and newly curated green lanes. Locals and newcomers collaborate in its vibrant co-working venues, while eco-conscious amenities and cycling paths punctuate the trendsetting local buzz. All essentials—from fresh markets to immersive nightlife and diverse cuisine—are merely steps away, each made accessible by robust public transport and an impressive network of bike lines.
target_buyer: Ideal for sustainability-focused professionals, families, or creatives who value green living, seamless smart-home solutions, and the pulse of a lively, innovative city center.
market_positioning: Uniquely situated at the intersection of style and sustainability, this duplex outshines typical offerings in its segment, elevating comfort and eco-friendly sophistication within one of Poznan’s most progressive and sought-after locations.
